sentences.en: A hare started off into the forest.
Because it makes its home in an extreme environment, the desert hare is biologically designed to radiate excess heat through its lanky limbs and oversized ears.
sentences.cn: 因为生长在极端环境中，沙漠兔子形成了独特的生物学构造，通过瘦长的四肢和超大的耳朵辐射多余的热量。

sentences.en: First catch your hare then cook him.
Foxes, wild cats and other animals pursue the hare.
sentences.cn: 狐狸 、 野猫及其他一些动物都捕食野兔.

sentences.en: He found the shin-bone of a hare lying on the grass.
sentences.cn: 他在草地上发现一根野兔的胫骨，骨头上有个洞；

sentences.en: He is as swift of foot as a hare.
I saw a hare in my backyard this morning.
sentences.cn: 今天早晨我看见后院有一只野兔.

sentences.en: Monks shave their heads, as do devotees of the Hare Krishna movement.
sentences.cn: 和尚要剃度，克利须那派教徒也一样。

sentences.en: The Australian wallaby resembles a hare and has persistent teeth.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的沙袋鼠形似野兔，有稳固的牙齿。

sentences.en: The hare could find no safety, a pack of jackals had it in the wind.
sentences.cn: 野兔无处逃生; 一群豺狗在追踪它.

sentences.en: The hare darted off like an arrow.
sentences.cn: 野兔像飞箭似的逃跑了.

sentences.en: The hare darted off with the velocity of a bird.
sentences.cn: 野兔像鸟一样快速掠去.

sentences.en: The insult made him go mad as a March hare.
sentences.cn: 这种侮辱把他给气疯了.

sentences.en: The lion pounced on the hare.
The little girl is as timid as a hare, shy in the presence of strangers.
sentences.cn: 这小姑娘胆子特别小, 怕人.

sentences.en: The tortoise wins the race while the hare is sleeping.
sentences.cn: 兔子正睡觉时,乌龟赢得了比赛.

sentences.en: We can organise car rental from Chicago O'Hare Airport.
sentences.cn: 我们可以安排提供从芝加哥奥黑尔机场出发的租车服务。
